languages.text: This value is added to the base chance of an enemy's dodge against all attacks.
languages.original_text: Число, прибавляемое к базовому шансу уклонения противника от всех атак.

languages.text: Dieser Wert wird der Basis-Chance eines Feindes zugefügt, jeglichen Angriffen auszuweichen.
languages.original_text: This value is added to the base chance of an enemy's dodge against all attacks.

traits.locale_text: Dieser Wert wird der Basis-Chance eines Feindes zugefügt, jeglichen Angriffen auszuweichen.

languages.text: Cette valeur est ajoutée aux chances d'esquive de base d'un ennemi, toutes attaques confondues.
languages.original_text: This value is added to the base chance of an enemy's dodge against all attacks.

traits.locale_text: Cette valeur est ajoutée aux chances de base d'esquive d'un ennemi, toutes attaques confondues.

languages.text: 当敌人试图闪避攻击时，这个数值会被加在敌人的基础闪避几率上。
languages.original_text: This value is added to the base chance of an enemy's dodge against all attacks.

traits.locale_text: 当敌人试图闪避攻击时，这个数值会被加在敌人的基础闪避几率上。

languages.text: Este valor se añade a la probabilidad básica de esquiva de los enemigos contra todos los ataques.
languages.original_text: This value is added to the base chance of an enemy's dodge against all attacks.

traits.locale_text: Este valor se añade a la probabilidad básica de esquiva de los enemigos contra todos los ataques.

languages.text: この値は、全ての攻撃に対する敵の回避の基本確率に加算される。
languages.original_text: This value is added to the base chance of an enemy's dodge against all attacks.

traits.locale_text: この値は、全ての攻撃に対する敵の回避の基本確率に加算される。

languages.text: Bu değer, düşmanın tüm saldırılara karşı taban kaçınma olasılığına eklenir.
languages.original_text: This value is added to the base chance of an enemy's dodge against all attacks.
